title: How to quickly make friends in a new city #innerconfidencepodcast
caption: false

channel_info.title: Robbie Kramer
channel_info.description:
I'm Robbie Kramer 🎙Host of The Inner Confidence Podcast & Founder of Inner Confidence, Inc.

I lived an exhilarating single life filled with adventures and lessons, and ultimately achieved what I had always aspired to – finding an amazing, feminine, and loving wife. 

I believe my experiences provide a rare balance of wild freedom and committed love, equipping me with the insights to help you navigate the complexities of dating and relationships in today's world. Let me guide you to embrace your desires, improve your social prowess, and ultimately attract the partner who aligns with your highest aspirations.

You won’t find any fluffy, new-age, or cringy stuff here, just tested, proven and actionable advice that yields results.

Apply to join our exclusive Inner Confidence Community of ambitious men who are actively working together to achieve their goals faster   ► https://innerconfidence.com/community

You can email me at robbie@innerconfidence.com with any questions or comments.

transcription: {"text": "If I drop you in a new city and ask you to start a new circle with more girls from scratch, quickly describe in five to ten steps. That's a good question, my friend. The first thing I would do is ask myself, who do I already know in this city? What information can I extract from them? And I would do that from a place of value giving and not just taking. So I'm looking for value from them. I wouldn't want them to think that they were doing me a favor. Make sure there's an exchange there. And I wouldn't come at it from like a very obvious, I need this information type of thing and be like, hey, let's catch up. Like I just moved here, would love to see you. I'm not going to try and start escalating and like asking them a whole bunch of questions unless they start volunteering that information. I'm going to ask them about them. I'm going to get to know them more. I'm going to like build the relationship and then I'm going to start asking stuff. So at first I'd lean in on who I knew. Then I would also look on, you know, any sort of like internet communities and I would look to see like where I could find other people that were sort of in nightlife. I'd look at other Instagram accounts. I might go on Meetup and I'd look to see like are any of these events cool? Do any of these people seem like people that might have some information or might be doing some cool things that would help me to get into.
